alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:05PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BALDWIN...SOUTHERN SANTA ROSA AND SOUTHEASTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles north of Elberta, or 9 miles east of Robertsdale, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Foley, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Orange Beach, Goulding, Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Perdido Beach, and Elberta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
